properties.venue_notes: FISH FRY… TAKE OUT ONLY!  You must PHONE your order in.  When ordering, please be patient and listen to the entire prompt menu.  Do not press “4” until you hear the prompt.  During our Fish Fry, our phones are very busy.  Please be patient if you hear a busy signal and try again.  The office phone will not be answered during the Fish Fry Hours and no messages will be returned.  Pick up will be at the 7th street entrance (big brown doors) to the church hall.  We will follow the same format as last year’s Fish Frys.  You will be given a pick-up time & order # when you phone in your order.  Phones will be answered beginning at 9:00 am on Fish Fry Fridays.  Calling early will enable you to pick a convenient time for your order.   Pick-up order times are scheduled to provide social distancing.  To avoid any congestion in the church entrance way, Please be on time.  Thank you.  Volunteers are needed in all areas!  Without enough help, the menu for the Fish Fry’s will be limited.  Please call the office or sign up (in the church) to schedule your availability.  This is the main fundraiser for SEAS Church.  We need our Fish Frys!

TAKE OUT ONLY
Through our drive up service
It's easy.  Place your order either online or by phone.  Come pick it up by following the signs around the block to our front door.  A member of our department will great you outside, at your car to get your order.  You never leave your car and stay warm, dry and safe.

All orders must be placed either online or by phone.

Nobody other than our staff will be permitted in the building.  For our safety and yours.

Our staff member's will have their temperature checked upon entering our building and will be wearing a mask and gloves during the entire process from when food is delivered to our station to when we deliver it to your car.

We strongly suggest and would appreciate everyone completing their order by using a debit or credit card.  If you are ordering by phone, our order takers can take your payment over the phone. No checks or cash please.

properties.venue_notes:
Parish Fish Fry 
Starts this Friday, Feb. 24 | 5-7PM | SHES Cafeteria

The Parish Fish Fry is held every Friday during Lent, with the exception of Good Friday.  Please join us from  5:00—7:00pm in the Sacred Heart Elementary School Cafeteria.  All meals will be packaged for takeout, but you are welcome to stay and dine in our cafeteria! 

Ordering and paying online is preferred. The online order form will be available starting at 3:00pm on Fridays.   Orders will be available for pick up at Sacred Heart Elementary School between 5:00 and 7:00pm.  The menu includes fried fish (bun or no bun) with two sides:  mac and cheese and coleslaw or French fries and coleslaw.  Desserts will also be available for purchase in person (while they last!). 

Order Form Link:  bit.ly/saintjudefishfry  or scan the QR code 

If you are unable to access the online form, we will take phone orders beginning at 4:00pm. Please call 412-361-3131.
